title: Charming Family Home with Timeless Character in Zaspa
description: Step into this historic-inspired four-bedroom home in the heart of Zaspa, Gdansk, where classical touches meet modern convenience. Spanning an ample 192 sqm, this stunner exudes old-world elegance with hardwood floors, archways, and vintage finishes throughout. The sunlit living area opens to a charming balcony, while three full bathrooms offer function and comfort for busy student living or shared arrangements.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in a family-friendly corner of Zaspa, this peaceful area boasts tree-lined paths, children’s parks, and safe cycling lanes ideal for relaxed commutes. You'll find convenient public transport links—designed for students or professionals—with local eateries, supermarkets, and study spaces nearby. The neighborhood offers a subtle suburban calm, perfect for unwinding after long hours at the university or library.
